fields.title: Welcoming
fields.content:
• Friendly and helping staff
  • Convenient appointments (Evening hours, Saturdays)
  • Comfortable environment

fields.title: Immediate and attentive care
fields.content:
• Same day emergency treatment
  • Our Doctors On-call
  • 24 hour service

fields.title: Your safety and protection
fields.content:
• Instrument Sterilization and Infection Control
  • Pain free numbing
  • Superbly trained technicians

fields.title: Expertise and training
fields.content:
• Ongoing advanced training
  • Newest technologies and treatment
  • Finest products and materials

fields.title: Family friendly
fields.content:
• Families and individuals of all ages
  • Children as young as 1 years old
  • Your opinions and needs matter

fields.title: Making dentistry affordable
fields.content:
• Accepting most insurances and major credit cards
  • In-house discount dental plan for non-insured patients
  • 5% senior courtesy for all patients over 65
